headline: NRG Energy, Inc. to Report First Quarter 2025 Financial Results on May 12, 2025
summary: HOUSTON, May 02, 2025--NRG Energy, Inc. (NYSE:NRG) plans to report its first quarter 2025 financial results on Monday, May 12, 2025. Management will present the results during a conference call and webcast at 9:00 a.m. EST (8:00 a.m. CST).
